title: Ucy
author: Ucy
content: I'm actually part of the developers community, an independent developer for that matter. My works have been copied by several companies(not sure if they will agree) , and have actually benefitted the cryptocurrency space but I have received nothing in return even though I have never asked for anything in return. I just do this for free especially due to my beliefs.Now I have made claims that sound outrageous but no one so far has been able to prove them wrong, for example on how certain kind of posts can influence the price of Bitcoin... well anyone who has been observing will notice this is true with my posts. Â Not just this, your business will most likely succeed beyond your expectations if it is a good business and you follow my advice for the business. I personally will have the business in my thoughts and prayers to see that it succeed. All you need to do is to believe. You may ask, if what I claim are true, why do I not own a business and make money from it, well making money is not part of my role, most of my current jobs are done for free, I don't demand for reward and that is basically how priests are suppose to operate. How you can sponsor me in a risk free manner:  if my claims about Bitcoin price are true, you can donate to my Bitcoin address which will be provided once I find a sponsor... Afterall when price increase according to my forecasts/predictions(which are precised) you also benefit. Or you can also rent my signature space to advertise your good/moral company. Deal?

comments.author: VictorProsh
comments.body: I like your conviction to work for an idea, few people are able to decide on it.I have offered programmers many times to help in the development of the project, but each time I was refused. It's clear to me, everyone wants to earn money first of all, and whether their work will get further development or not, they care about it second of all. The project is very difficult to understand, you can't solve it alone, so you need a team capable of implementing it. Try to delve into the essence of the idea, not many have succeeded, maybe your work will help to move the dead stone in solving this issue with God and your help.
